code: export function getFormatedDate(){var today=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:new Date();return today.getDate()+"/"+(today.getMonth()+1)+"/"+today.getFullYear();}function getFirstDayofTheWeek(){var d=new Date();var day=d.getDay(),diff=d.getDate()-day+(day===0?-6:1);return new Date(d.setDate(diff));}export function getCurrentWeek(){var day=getFirstDayofTheWeek();var week=[];for(var i=0;i<7;i++){week.push(getFormatedDate(day));day.setDate(day.getDate()+1);}return week;}
